title: Passenger Revenues, Pullman Company for United States
notes:
Data Refer To Revenues Derived From Paying Passengers Including Berth And Seat Revenues. Source: U.S. Department Of Commerce, Survey Of Current Business, January 1939 And Following Issues.

This NBER data series m03010i appears on the NBER website in Chapter 3 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter03.html.

NBER Indicator: m03010i
